meanings.definition: An advantage or profit gained from something.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables regularly is a benefit to your health.
meanings.sent2: The benefit of exercising daily is feeling more energetic.
meanings.sent3: It's a benefit to have a friend who always makes you laugh.
meanings.sent4: The benefit of reading is that it opens up new worlds to explore.
meanings.sent5: The benefit of learning a new language is expanding your horizons.

meanings.definition: A payment or gift made by an employer, insurance company, or government agency.
meanings.sent1: Receiving a benefit from your employer can help cover medical expenses.
meanings.sent2: The company provides a retirement benefit to its long-term employees.
meanings.sent3: Getting a benefit from the government feels like a small victory.
meanings.sent4: The insurance benefit acted as a safety net during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The benefit package includes health insurance and paid time off.
